glossdef.p: Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB): The PCAOB is a non-profit organization established by the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002. Its purpose is to oversee the audits of public companies and other issuers, aiming to protect the interests of investors and further the public interest in the preparation of informative, accurate, and independent audit reports.
